name: LumaFusion Legacy Project
summary: A SPRYZIP file is a video editing project created by LumaFusion, a multitrack video editor available for macOS and iOS. It contains a copy of the video, audio, and other assets used in the project, as well as the project's timeline data. In more recent versions of LumaFusion, SPRYZIP files have been replaced by .LFPACKAGE files.
